firstInteraction: ^More experimentation is necessary - the subject is... Violent.
^We've had one human fatality and lost a lot of robotic material.
^I've replaced his main aperture with a fixed track, so he cant smash any more researchers against the walls.
^I've determined that reducing the Orbservers pattern recognition module will help it stop being frustrated with perceived non-performance.
^The terminal second from the left to 50% power, 0% virus should achieve the desired affect.
